body_html:
The error message looks fine with 0.4.0+ API:

data = [5, int(5), np.int32(5), np.int64(5), float(5)]
for d in data:
    try:
        a = torch.tensor(d)
        print("t = %s, type = %s" % (a.data, a.dtype))
    except Exception as e:
        print(e)
############
t = tensor(5), type = torch.int64
t = tensor(5), type = torch.int64
Could not infer dtype of numpy.int32
t = tensor(5), type = torch.int64
t = tensor(5.), type = torch.float32

And we are planning to deprecate torch.Tensor: #7900

body:
The error message looks fine with 0.4.0+ API:
```
data = [5, int(5), np.int32(5), np.int64(5), float(5)]
for d in data:
    try:
        a = torch.tensor(d)
        print("t = %s, type = %s" % (a.data, a.dtype))
    except Exception as e:
        print(e)
############
t = tensor(5), type = torch.int64
t = tensor(5), type = torch.int64
Could not infer dtype of numpy.int32
t = tensor(5), type = torch.int64
t = tensor(5.), type = torch.float32
```

And we are planning to deprecate torch.Tensor: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7900
